resources.string: After hiding the app icon, the interface may be closed and will no longer be displayed on the launcher. You can find and open the module settings in LSPosed.
Note: Be sure to turn off the \"Force apps to show launcher icons\" feature in LSPosed

In order to ensure stability, under the condition of enabling the system application whitelist, certain critical system components will still not be prevented from accessing accessibility features. However, users are allowed to decide whether to apply accessibility to these critical components. If, when using the whitelist mode, some applications requiring accessibility are automatically closed, please try allowing the system interface to access accessibility features. Third-party applications are only permitted to use whitelist mode.

The default system app uses blacklist mode. When this switch is turned on, system apps also use whitelist mode, which is consistent with third-party app behavior. All applications (including third-party applications and system applications) cannot be detected by default and need to be checked in the application list to be readable.
Displaying Hook notifications will trigger a Toast during the Hook process, which can aid in your debugging;
Allow not to remove account settings Device Administrator
Removed the limit on the number of recent task locks in ColorOS
Enter the app name or package name search

(Dangerous) may reduce stability. By default, it is allowed to start with \"Android.\" The system package names at the beginning are readable, and when this switch is turned on, they will also be prevented from reading.
Allow the blocking of system components from accessing accessibility features.
(调试功能)挂钩所有方法,方法被调用时输出日志
